content: 1 Paul, an apostle of Christ Jesus､ through the will of God, And Timothy the brother,— Unto the assembly of God which is in Corinth､ Together with all the saints who are in the whole of Achaia:
content_old: 1 Paul, an apostle of Christ Jesus､ through the will of God, And Timothy the brother,— Unto the assembly of God which is in Corinth､ Together with all the saints who are in the whole of Achaia:

content: 2 Favour unto you､ and peace, From God our Father､ and Lord Jesus Christ.
content_old: 2 Favour unto you､ and peace, From God our Father､ and Lord Jesus Christ.

content: 3 Blessed be the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ､ The Father of compassions､ And God of all encouragement,
content_old: 3 Blessed be the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ､ The Father of compassions､ And God of all encouragement,

content: 4 Who encourageth us in all our tribulation､ To the end we may be able to encourage them who are in any tribulation— Through means of the encouragement wherewith we ourselves are encouraged by God.
content_old: 4 Who encourageth us in all our tribulation､ To the end we may be able to encourage them who are in any tribulation— Through means of the encouragement wherewith we ourselves are encouraged by God.

content: 5 Because even as the sufferings of the Christ overflow unto us So through the Christ overfloweth our encouragement also.
content_old: 5 Because even as the sufferings of the Christ overflow unto us So through the Christ overfloweth our encouragement also.

content: 6 But whether we are in tribulation It is for your encouragement and salvation; Whether we are encouraged It is for your encouragement､ which worketh inwardly by the endurance of the same sufferings which we also suffer;—
content_old: 6 But whether we are in tribulation It is for your encouragement and salvation; Whether we are encouraged It is for your encouragement､ which worketh inwardly by the endurance of the same sufferings which we also suffer;—

content: 7 And so our hope is sure in your behalf,—Knowing that— As ye are sharers of the sufferings So also of the encouragement.
content_old: 7 And so our hope is sure in your behalf,—Knowing that— As ye are sharers of the sufferings So also of the encouragement.

content: 8 For we do not wish you to be ignorant､ brethren, as to our tribulation which happened in Asia,— That exceedingly､ beyond power were we weighed down, So that we despaired even of life.
content_old: 8 For we do not wish you to be ignorant､ brethren, as to our tribulation which happened in Asia,— That exceedingly､ beyond power were we weighed down, So that we despaired even of life.

content: 9 But we ourselves､ within ourselves have had the sentence of death, That we might not rest our confidence upon ourselves､ But upon God who raiseth the dead,
content_old: 9 But we ourselves､ within ourselves have had the sentence of death, That we might not rest our confidence upon ourselves､ But upon God who raiseth the dead,

content: 10 who out of so great a death rescued us､ and will rescue,— Unto whom we have turned our hope､ that even yet he will rescue:
content_old: 10 who out of so great a death rescued us､ and will rescue,— Unto whom we have turned our hope､ that even yet he will rescue:

content: 11 Ye also labouring together on our behalf by your supplication, That unto many persons being due the gift of favour unto us Through means of many might thanks be given in our behalf.
content_old: 11 Ye also labouring together on our behalf by your supplication, That unto many persons being due the gift of favour unto us Through means of many might thanks be given in our behalf.

content: 12 For our boasting is this——The witness of our conscience, That in sanctity and sincerity of God, And not in fleshly wisdom､ but in God’s favour Have we behaved ourselves in the world,— And more abundantly towards you.
content_old: 12 For our boasting is this——The witness of our conscience, That in sanctity and sincerity of God, And not in fleshly wisdom､ but in God’s favour Have we behaved ourselves in the world,— And more abundantly towards you.

content: 13 For no other things are we writing unto you､ than what ye are either reading or even acknowledging,—I hope､ moreover､ that throughout ye will acknowledge,
content_old: 13 For no other things are we writing unto you､ than what ye are either reading or even acknowledging,—I hope､ moreover､ that throughout ye will acknowledge,

content: 14 According as ye have also acknowledged us､ in part,— That your theme of boasting we are, Even indeed as ye also shall be ours in the day of our Lord Jesus.
content_old: 14 According as ye have also acknowledged us､ in part,— That your theme of boasting we are, Even indeed as ye also shall be ours in the day of our Lord Jesus.

content: 15 And in this confidence I purposed､ before to come unto you,— In order that a second joy ye might have,—
content_old: 15 And in this confidence I purposed､ before to come unto you,— In order that a second joy ye might have,—

content: 16 And by your means to pass into Macedonia, And again from Macedonia to come unto you, And by you be set forward unto Judæa:—
content_old: 16 And by your means to pass into Macedonia, And again from Macedonia to come unto you, And by you be set forward unto Judæa:—

content: 17 This then､ being my purpose Perhaps after all with lightness I dealt with the matter? Or the things that I purpose according to the flesh I purpose,— That with me should be the Yea､ yea, and the Nay､ nay?
content_old: 17 This then､ being my purpose Perhaps after all with lightness I dealt with the matter? Or the things that I purpose according to the flesh I purpose,— That with me should be the Yea､ yea, and the Nay､ nay?

content: 18 Faithful however､ is God, in that our discourse､ which was delivered unto you is not Yea and Nay;
content_old: 18 Faithful however､ is God, in that our discourse､ which was delivered unto you is not Yea and Nay;

content: 19 For the Son of God､ Christ Jesus— Who among you､ through us was proclaimed,— Through me､ and Silvanus､ and Timothy Became not Yea and Nay,— But Yea､ in him hath it become;
content_old: 19 For the Son of God､ Christ Jesus— Who among you､ through us was proclaimed,— Through me､ and Silvanus､ and Timothy Became not Yea and Nay,— But Yea､ in him hath it become;

content: 20 For how many soever be the promises of God In him is the Yea,— Wherefore also through him be the Amen､ unto God, For glory､ through us.
content_old: 20 For how many soever be the promises of God In him is the Yea,— Wherefore also through him be the Amen､ unto God, For glory､ through us.

content: 21 Now he that confirmeth us､ together with you､ for Christ, And hath anointed us Is God:
content_old: 21 Now he that confirmeth us､ together with you､ for Christ, And hath anointed us Is God:

content: 22 Who also hath sealed us､ And given the earnest of the Spirit in our hearts.
content_old: 22 Who also hath sealed us､ And given the earnest of the Spirit in our hearts.

content: 23 But I call upon God as a witness against my own soul,— That to spare you not yet have I come unto Corinth:
content_old: 23 But I call upon God as a witness against my own soul,— That to spare you not yet have I come unto Corinth:

content: 1 For I have determined､ unto myself､ this— Not again､ in grief to come unto you.
content_old: 1 For I have determined､ unto myself､ this— Not again､ in grief to come unto you.

content: 2 For if I grieve you Who then is he that is to gladden me,— Save he who is being grieved through me;
content_old: 2 For if I grieve you Who then is he that is to gladden me,— Save he who is being grieved through me;

content: 3 And I wrote this very thing— Lest if I came I should have grief from those over whom I had need to rejoice,— Having confidence in you all､ That my joy is the joy of you all.
content_old: 3 And I wrote this very thing— Lest if I came I should have grief from those over whom I had need to rejoice,— Having confidence in you all､ That my joy is the joy of you all.

content: 4 For out of much tribulation and anguish of heart wrote I unto you､ through many tears,— Not that ye might be grieved､ But that the love ye might know､ which I have very abundantly unto you.
content_old: 4 For out of much tribulation and anguish of heart wrote I unto you､ through many tears,— Not that ye might be grieved､ But that the love ye might know､ which I have very abundantly unto you.

content: 5 Now if anyone hath caused grief Not unto me hath he caused grief, But——that I may not bear too heavily——unto you all.
content_old: 5 Now if anyone hath caused grief Not unto me hath he caused grief, But——that I may not bear too heavily——unto you all.

content: 6 Sufficient unto such a one､ the punishment itself which was inflicted by the many;
content_old: 6 Sufficient unto such a one､ the punishment itself which was inflicted by the many;

content: 7 So that on the contrary ye should forgive and encourage, Lest､ by any means､ by his excessive grief such a one should be swallowed up.
content_old: 7 So that on the contrary ye should forgive and encourage, Lest､ by any means､ by his excessive grief such a one should be swallowed up.

content: 8 Wherefore､ I beseech you､ assure him of love;
content_old: 8 Wherefore､ I beseech you､ assure him of love;

content: 9 For to this end I also wrote,— That I might know the proof of you､ Whether in all things ye are obedient.
content_old: 9 For to this end I also wrote,— That I might know the proof of you､ Whether in all things ye are obedient.

content: 10 Now to whom ye forgive anything I､ also; For I also what I have forgiven, if anything I have forgiven For your sake､ in the person of Christ have I forgiven it.
content_old: 10 Now to whom ye forgive anything I､ also; For I also what I have forgiven, if anything I have forgiven For your sake､ in the person of Christ have I forgiven it.

content: 11 Lest we should be overreached by Satan, For of his thoughts we are not ignorant.
content_old: 11 Lest we should be overreached by Satan, For of his thoughts we are not ignorant.

content: 12 Moreover although I came unto Troas for the glad-message of the Christ, and a door for me had been opened in the Lord
content_old: 12 Moreover although I came unto Troas for the glad-message of the Christ, and a door for me had been opened in the Lord

content: 13 I had no relief in my spirit､ because I found not Titus my brother; But taking my leave of them I came away into Macedonia.
content_old: 13 I had no relief in my spirit､ because I found not Titus my brother; But taking my leave of them I came away into Macedonia.

content: 14 But unto God be thanks Who ever leadeth us in triumph in the Christ, And the fragrance of the knowledge of him maketh manifest､ through us､ in every place
content_old: 14 But unto God be thanks Who ever leadeth us in triumph in the Christ, And the fragrance of the knowledge of him maketh manifest､ through us､ in every place

content: 15 That of Christ a grateful odour are we､ unto God,— In them who are being saved, And in thorn who are being lost:
content_old: 15 That of Christ a grateful odour are we､ unto God,— In them who are being saved, And in thorn who are being lost:

content: 16 In these indeed､ a fragrance out of death into death, But in those a fragrance out of life into life. And for these things who is sufficient?
content_old: 16 In these indeed､ a fragrance out of death into death, But in those a fragrance out of life into life. And for these things who is sufficient?

content: 1 Are we to begin again ourselves to commend? Or have we need like some of commendatory letters unto you､ or from you?
content_old: 1 Are we to begin again ourselves to commend? Or have we need like some of commendatory letters unto you､ or from you?

content: 2 Our letter ye are､ Inscribed in our hearts, Noted and read by all men:
content_old: 2 Our letter ye are､ Inscribed in our hearts, Noted and read by all men:

content: 3 Manifesting yourselves that ye are a letter of Christ､ ministered by us,— Inscribed— Not with ink､ But with the Spirit of a Living God, Not in tablets of stone､ But in tablets which are hearts of flesh.
content_old: 3 Manifesting yourselves that ye are a letter of Christ､ ministered by us,— Inscribed— Not with ink､ But with the Spirit of a Living God, Not in tablets of stone､ But in tablets which are hearts of flesh.

content: 4 But such confidence as this have we､ Through the Christ､ towards God.
content_old: 4 But such confidence as this have we､ Through the Christ､ towards God.

content: 5 Not that of our own selves sufficient are we､ to reckon anything as of ourselves, But our sufficiency is of God;—
content_old: 5 Not that of our own selves sufficient are we､ to reckon anything as of ourselves, But our sufficiency is of God;—

content: 6 Who also hath made us sufficient to be ministers of a new covenant— Not of letter､ But of spirit, For the letter killeth､ Whereas the Spirit maketh alive.
content_old: 6 Who also hath made us sufficient to be ministers of a new covenant— Not of letter､ But of spirit, For the letter killeth､ Whereas the Spirit maketh alive.

content: 7 But if the ministry of death､ in letters engraven in stones was brought into existence with glory, So that the sons of Israel could not look steadfastly into the face of Moses､ By reason of the glory of his face— Which glory was to be done away
content_old: 7 But if the ministry of death､ in letters engraven in stones was brought into existence with glory, So that the sons of Israel could not look steadfastly into the face of Moses､ By reason of the glory of his face— Which glory was to be done away

content: 8 How shall not rather the ministry of the Spirit be with glory?
content_old: 8 How shall not rather the ministry of the Spirit be with glory?

content: 9 For if the ministry of condemnation was glory Much rather doth the ministry of righteousness abound with glory.
content_old: 9 For if the ministry of condemnation was glory Much rather doth the ministry of righteousness abound with glory.

content: 10 For that which hath been made glorious hath not even been made glorious in this respect,— By reason of the surpassing glory.
content_old: 10 For that which hath been made glorious hath not even been made glorious in this respect,— By reason of the surpassing glory.

content: 11 For if that which was to be done away was brought in with glory Much more that which is to abide is in glory.
content_old: 11 For if that which was to be done away was brought in with glory Much more that which is to abide is in glory.

content: 12 Having､ then､ such hope as this Great openness of speech do we use;—
content_old: 12 Having､ then､ such hope as this Great openness of speech do we use;—

content: 13 And are not just like Moses, who kept putting a reil upon his face､ So that the sons of Israel should not look steadily unto the end of that which was to be done away.
content_old: 13 And are not just like Moses, who kept putting a reil upon his face､ So that the sons of Israel should not look steadily unto the end of that which was to be done away.

content: 14 But their thoughts were turned into stone: For until this very day the same veil upon the reading of the old covenant abideth, not to be removed, Because in Christ it is to be done away;
content_old: 14 But their thoughts were turned into stone: For until this very day the same veil upon the reading of the old covenant abideth, not to be removed, Because in Christ it is to be done away;

content: 15 But until this day whensoever Moses is read a veil upon their heart doth lie;
content_old: 15 But until this day whensoever Moses is read a veil upon their heart doth lie;

content: 16 Howbeit whensoever he turneth unto the Lord he taketh off the veil:
content_old: 16 Howbeit whensoever he turneth unto the Lord he taketh off the veil:

content: 17 And theLord is the Spirit: Now where the Spirit of one who is Lord is there is freedom!
content_old: 17 And theLord is the Spirit: Now where the Spirit of one who is Lord is there is freedom!

content: 1 Wherefore having this ministry､ even as we received mercy we faint not;
content_old: 1 Wherefore having this ministry､ even as we received mercy we faint not;

content: 2 But have renounced the hidden things of shame, Not walking in craftiness､ Nor handling the word of God deceitfully,— But by the manifestation of the truth commending ourselves unto every conscience of men､ in the sight of God.
content_old: 2 But have renounced the hidden things of shame, Not walking in craftiness､ Nor handling the word of God deceitfully,— But by the manifestation of the truth commending ourselves unto every conscience of men､ in the sight of God.

content: 3 And even if our glad-message is veiled In them who are perishing it is veiled,
content_old: 3 And even if our glad-message is veiled In them who are perishing it is veiled,

content: 4 In whom the god of this age hath blinded the minds of the unbelieving､ To the end they may not discern the radiance of the glad-message of the glory of the Christ—Who is the image of God.
content_old: 4 In whom the god of this age hath blinded the minds of the unbelieving､ To the end they may not discern the radiance of the glad-message of the glory of the Christ—Who is the image of God.

content: 5 For not ourselves do we proclaim､ but Christ Jesus as Lord, And ourselves as your servants for Jesus’ sake.
content_old: 5 For not ourselves do we proclaim､ but Christ Jesus as Lord, And ourselves as your servants for Jesus’ sake.

content: 6 Because the God who said— Out of darkness light shall shine! Is he who hath shone in our hearts､ In proportion to the radiance of the glorious knowledge of God､ in the face of Christ.
content_old: 6 Because the God who said— Out of darkness light shall shine! Is he who hath shone in our hearts､ In proportion to the radiance of the glorious knowledge of God､ in the face of Christ.

content: 7 Howbeit we have this treasure in earthen vessels, That the surpassing greatness of the power may be of God､ and not from ourselves:—
content_old: 7 Howbeit we have this treasure in earthen vessels, That the surpassing greatness of the power may be of God､ and not from ourselves:—

content: 8 On every side pressed hard､ but not hemmed in, Without a way､ but not without a by-way,
content_old: 8 On every side pressed hard､ but not hemmed in, Without a way､ but not without a by-way,

content: 9 Pursued､ but not abandoned, Thrown down､ but not destroyed;—
content_old: 9 Pursued､ but not abandoned, Thrown down､ but not destroyed;—

content: 10 At all times､ the putting to death of Jesus in our body bearing about, In order that the life also of Jesus in our body may be made manifest;
content_old: 10 At all times､ the putting to death of Jesus in our body bearing about, In order that the life also of Jesus in our body may be made manifest;

content: 11 For evermore we､ the living unto death are being delivered､ for Jesus sake, In order that the life also of Jesus may be made manifest in our mortal flesh:
content_old: 11 For evermore we､ the living unto death are being delivered､ for Jesus sake, In order that the life also of Jesus may be made manifest in our mortal flesh:

content: 12 So that his death in us doth energise, But his life in you.
content_old: 12 So that his death in us doth energise, But his life in you.

content: 13 Howbeit seeing that we have the same spirit of faith, According to that which is written— I believed､ therefore I spake We also believe､ therefore also we speak:
content_old: 13 Howbeit seeing that we have the same spirit of faith, According to that which is written— I believed､ therefore I spake We also believe､ therefore also we speak:

content: 14 Knowing that he who raised up the Lord Jesus will raise up us also､ together with Jesus and will present us together with you.
content_old: 14 Knowing that he who raised up the Lord Jesus will raise up us also､ together with Jesus and will present us together with you.

content: 15 For all things are for your sakes, In order that the favour abounding May through means of the greater number cause the thanksgiving to superabound unto the glory of God.
content_old: 15 For all things are for your sakes, In order that the favour abounding May through means of the greater number cause the thanksgiving to superabound unto the glory of God.

content: 16 Wherefore we faint not, But even if our outer man is decaying Nevertheless our inner man is renewing day by day.
content_old: 16 Wherefore we faint not, But even if our outer man is decaying Nevertheless our inner man is renewing day by day.

content: 17 For the momentary lightness of the tribulation In a manner yet more and more excelling Is working out for us an age-abiding weight of glory,—
content_old: 17 For the momentary lightness of the tribulation In a manner yet more and more excelling Is working out for us an age-abiding weight of glory,—

content: 1 For we know that— If our earthly tent-dwelling should be taken down We have a building of God, A dwelling not made by hand､ Age-abiding in the heavens.
content_old: 1 For we know that— If our earthly tent-dwelling should be taken down We have a building of God, A dwelling not made by hand､ Age-abiding in the heavens.

content: 2 And verily in this we sigh､ earnestly desiring to clothe ourselves over with our habitation which is of heaven,—
content_old: 2 And verily in this we sigh､ earnestly desiring to clothe ourselves over with our habitation which is of heaven,—

content: 3 Although､ indeed even clothing ourselves we shall not be found naked;—
content_old: 3 Although､ indeed even clothing ourselves we shall not be found naked;—

content: 4 And verily we who are in the tent do sigh､ being weighed down, While yet we are not wishing to unclothe ourselves､ but to clothe ourselves over,— In order that what is mortal may be swallowed up by life.
content_old: 4 And verily we who are in the tent do sigh､ being weighed down, While yet we are not wishing to unclothe ourselves､ but to clothe ourselves over,— In order that what is mortal may be swallowed up by life.

content: 5 Now he that hath wrought us for this very thing is God,— Who hath given unto us the earnest of the Spirit,
content_old: 5 Now he that hath wrought us for this very thing is God,— Who hath given unto us the earnest of the Spirit,

content: 6 Having good courage､ therefore､ at all times, And knowing that— Remaining at home in the body､ We are away from home from the Lord,—
content_old: 6 Having good courage､ therefore､ at all times, And knowing that— Remaining at home in the body､ We are away from home from the Lord,—

content: 7 By faith are we walking､ Not by sight;—
content_old: 7 By faith are we walking､ Not by sight;—

content: 8 We have good courage､ however, and are well pleased— Rather to be away from home､ out of the body, And to come home､ unto the Lord.
content_old: 8 We have good courage､ however, and are well pleased— Rather to be away from home､ out of the body, And to come home､ unto the Lord.

content: 9 Wherefore also we are ambitious— Whether at home､ or away from home To be well-pleasing unto him.
content_old: 9 Wherefore also we are ambitious— Whether at home､ or away from home To be well-pleasing unto him.

content: 10 For we all must needs be made manifest before the judgment seat of the Christ, That each one may get back the things done by means of the body, According to the things which he practised､ Whether good or corrupt.
content_old: 10 For we all must needs be made manifest before the judgment seat of the Christ, That each one may get back the things done by means of the body, According to the things which he practised､ Whether good or corrupt.

content: 11 Knowing､ then､ the fear of the Lord We persuade men, But unto God are manifest,— I hope､ moreover､ even in your consciences that we are manifest:
content_old: 11 Knowing､ then､ the fear of the Lord We persuade men, But unto God are manifest,— I hope､ moreover､ even in your consciences that we are manifest:

content: 12 Not again､ ourselves do we commend unto you, But as though an occasion we were giving unto you—something to boast of､ in our behalf; That ye may have something suited unto them who in appearance are boasting､ and not in heart.
content_old: 12 Not again､ ourselves do we commend unto you, But as though an occasion we were giving unto you—something to boast of､ in our behalf; That ye may have something suited unto them who in appearance are boasting､ and not in heart.

content: 13 For whether we have been beside ourselves it hath been for God, Or whether we are sober-minded it is for you.
content_old: 13 For whether we have been beside ourselves it hath been for God, Or whether we are sober-minded it is for you.

content: 14 For the love of the Christ constraineth us;—
content_old: 14 For the love of the Christ constraineth us;—

content: 15 Having judged this,— That one in behalf of all died, Hence they all died; And in behalf of all died he,— In order that they who live No longer for themselves should live, But for him who in their behalf died and rose again.
content_old: 15 Having judged this,— That one in behalf of all died, Hence they all died; And in behalf of all died he,— In order that they who live No longer for themselves should live, But for him who in their behalf died and rose again.

content: 16 So that we henceforth know no one after the flesh: If we have even been gaining､ after the flesh､ a knowledge of Christ
content_old: 16 So that we henceforth know no one after the flesh: If we have even been gaining､ after the flesh､ a knowledge of Christ

content: 17 On the contrary now､ no longer are we gaining it. So that if any one is in Christ there is a new creation! The old things have passed away,— Lo! they have become new!
content_old: 17 On the contrary now､ no longer are we gaining it. So that if any one is in Christ there is a new creation! The old things have passed away,— Lo! they have become new!

content: 18 The all things moreover､ are of God,— Who hath reconciled us unto himself､ through Christ, And hath given､ unto us､ the reconciling ministry:—
content_old: 18 The all things moreover､ are of God,— Who hath reconciled us unto himself､ through Christ, And hath given､ unto us､ the reconciling ministry:—

content: 19 How that God was in Christ､ Reconciling a world unto himself, Not reckoning､ unto them､ their offences,— And hath put､ in us､ the reconciling’ discourse.
content_old: 19 How that God was in Christ､ Reconciling a world unto himself, Not reckoning､ unto them､ their offences,— And hath put､ in us､ the reconciling’ discourse.

content: 20 In behalf of Christ therefore､ are we ambassadors,— As if God were beseeching through us: We entreat､ in behalf of Christ､— Be reconciled unto God!
content_old: 20 In behalf of Christ therefore､ are we ambassadors,— As if God were beseeching through us: We entreat､ in behalf of Christ､— Be reconciled unto God!

content: 1 As co-workers､ however we also beseech､ That not in vain the favour of God ye welcome;
content_old: 1 As co-workers､ however we also beseech､ That not in vain the favour of God ye welcome;

content: 2 For he saith— In an approved season have I hearkened unto thee, And in a day of salvation have I succoured thee;— Lo! now a well-approved season, Lo! now a day of salvation:
content_old: 2 For he saith— In an approved season have I hearkened unto thee, And in a day of salvation have I succoured thee;— Lo! now a well-approved season, Lo! now a day of salvation:

content: 3 Giving no single occasion of stumbling in anything, That the ministry be not blamed;
content_old: 3 Giving no single occasion of stumbling in anything, That the ministry be not blamed;

content: 4 But in everything commending ourselves as God’s ministers,— In much endurance､ in tribulations､ in necessities､ in straits,
content_old: 4 But in everything commending ourselves as God’s ministers,— In much endurance､ in tribulations､ in necessities､ in straits,

content: 5 in stripes､ in imprisonments､ in tumults, in toilings､ in watchings､ in fastings,
content_old: 5 in stripes､ in imprisonments､ in tumults, in toilings､ in watchings､ in fastings,

content: 6 in sanctity､ in knowledge､ in long-suffering, in graciousness､ in Holy Spirit､ in love
content_old: 6 in sanctity､ in knowledge､ in long-suffering, in graciousness､ in Holy Spirit､ in love

content: 7 unfeigned, in discourse of truth､ in power of God; Through the weapons of righteousness on the right hand and left,
content_old: 7 unfeigned, in discourse of truth､ in power of God; Through the weapons of righteousness on the right hand and left,

content: 8 through glory and dishonour, through bad report and good report; As deceivers､ and yet true,
content_old: 8 through glory and dishonour, through bad report and good report; As deceivers､ and yet true,

content: 9 as unknown､ and yet well-known, as dying､ and lo! we live, as disciplined､ and yet not put to death,
content_old: 9 as unknown､ and yet well-known, as dying､ and lo! we live, as disciplined､ and yet not put to death,

content: 10 as grieving､ yet ever rejoicing, as destitute､ yet making many rich, as holding nothing, and yet firmly holding all things.
content_old: 10 as grieving､ yet ever rejoicing, as destitute､ yet making many rich, as holding nothing, and yet firmly holding all things.

content: 11 Our mouth is opened unto you､ O Corinthians! Our heart hath become enlarged:
content_old: 11 Our mouth is opened unto you､ O Corinthians! Our heart hath become enlarged:

content: 12 Ye are not straitened in us､ But are straitened in your hearts’ affections;
content_old: 12 Ye are not straitened in us､ But are straitened in your hearts’ affections;

content: 13 Howbeit by way of the like recompense—as unto children I speak Be enlarged､ even ye.
content_old: 13 Howbeit by way of the like recompense—as unto children I speak Be enlarged､ even ye.

content: 14 Be not getting diversely yoked with unbelievers; For what partnership have righteousness and lawlessness? Or what fellowship hath light with darkness?
content_old: 14 Be not getting diversely yoked with unbelievers; For what partnership have righteousness and lawlessness? Or what fellowship hath light with darkness?

content: 15 And what concord hath Christ with Beliar? Or what part hath a believer with an unbeliever?
content_old: 15 And what concord hath Christ with Beliar? Or what part hath a believer with an unbeliever?

content: 16 And what agreement hath a shrine of God with idols? For we are the shrine of a God that liveth:— Even as God hath said— I will dwell in them､ and walk, And will be their God､ And they shall be my people.
content_old: 16 And what agreement hath a shrine of God with idols? For we are the shrine of a God that liveth:— Even as God hath said— I will dwell in them､ and walk, And will be their God､ And they shall be my people.

content: 17 Wherefore come ye forth out of their midst､ And be separated,—saith the Lord,— And one impure do not touch; And I will give you welcome,
content_old: 17 Wherefore come ye forth out of their midst､ And be separated,—saith the Lord,— And one impure do not touch; And I will give you welcome,

content: 1 Having therefore these promises､ beloved Let us purify ourselves from all pollution of flesh and spirit, Perfecting holiness in fear of God.
content_old: 1 Having therefore these promises､ beloved Let us purify ourselves from all pollution of flesh and spirit, Perfecting holiness in fear of God.

content: 2 Give place to us! No one have we wronged, No one have we corrupted, No one have we defrauded.
content_old: 2 Give place to us! No one have we wronged, No one have we corrupted, No one have we defrauded.

content: 3 Unto condemnation I am not saying this For I have before said— In our hearts are ye､ to the end we may die together and live together.
content_old: 3 Unto condemnation I am not saying this For I have before said— In our hearts are ye､ to the end we may die together and live together.

content: 4 Great is my freedom of speech towards you, Great is my boasting in behalf of you: I am filled with the encouragement, I am greatly superabounding with the joy, In all our tribulation.
content_old: 4 Great is my freedom of speech towards you, Great is my boasting in behalf of you: I am filled with the encouragement, I am greatly superabounding with the joy, In all our tribulation.

content: 5 For even when we came into Macedonia No relief at all had our flesh; But in every way were we in tribulation,— Without fightings! Within fears!
content_old: 5 For even when we came into Macedonia No relief at all had our flesh; But in every way were we in tribulation,— Without fightings! Within fears!

content: 6 But he who encourageth them that are brought low encouraged us,— Even God,—by the presence of Titus.
content_old: 6 But he who encourageth them that are brought low encouraged us,— Even God,—by the presence of Titus.

content: 7 Not､ however､ by his presence alone, But also by the encouragement wherewith he had been encouraged over you: Recounting unto us your earnest desire, your lamentation, your zeal in my behalf. So that I the more rejoiced.
content_old: 7 Not､ however､ by his presence alone, But also by the encouragement wherewith he had been encouraged over you: Recounting unto us your earnest desire, your lamentation, your zeal in my behalf. So that I the more rejoiced.

content: 8 Because if I even grieved you by the letter I do not regret,— Though I could even have regretted,— I see that that letter if even for an hour did cause you grief.
content_old: 8 Because if I even grieved you by the letter I do not regret,— Though I could even have regretted,— I see that that letter if even for an hour did cause you grief.

content: 9 Now am I rejoicing,— Not that ye were grieved, But that ye were grieved unto repentance; For ye were grieved according to God, In order that in nothing should ye receive damage from us.
content_old: 9 Now am I rejoicing,— Not that ye were grieved, But that ye were grieved unto repentance; For ye were grieved according to God, In order that in nothing should ye receive damage from us.

content: 10 For grief according to God worketh repentance unto salvation､ not to be regretted; Although the grieving of the world worketh death.
content_old: 10 For grief according to God worketh repentance unto salvation､ not to be regretted; Although the grieving of the world worketh death.

content: 11 For lo! this very thing—the being caused to grieve according to God:— What manner of diligence it wrought out in you,—nay! defence,—nay! sore displeasure,—nay! fear,—nay! earnest desire,—nay! jealousy,—nay! avenging. In every way ye shewed yourselves to be chaste in the matter.
content_old: 11 For lo! this very thing—the being caused to grieve according to God:— What manner of diligence it wrought out in you,—nay! defence,—nay! sore displeasure,—nay! fear,—nay! earnest desire,—nay! jealousy,—nay! avenging. In every way ye shewed yourselves to be chaste in the matter.

content: 12 Hence if I even wrote unto you It was not for the sake of him that did the wrong, Nay not even for the sake of him that suffered the wrong; But for the sake of your earnestness､ which was on our account､ being made manifest unto you､ before God:—
content_old: 12 Hence if I even wrote unto you It was not for the sake of him that did the wrong, Nay not even for the sake of him that suffered the wrong; But for the sake of your earnestness､ which was on our account､ being made manifest unto you､ before God:—

content: 13 For this cause have we received encouragement. In addition to our encouragement､ however Much more abundantly have we rejoiced over the joy of Titus,— That his spirit hath received refreshment from you all,
content_old: 13 For this cause have we received encouragement. In addition to our encouragement､ however Much more abundantly have we rejoiced over the joy of Titus,— That his spirit hath received refreshment from you all,

content: 14 That if in anything—unto him—in your behalf—I have boasted I have not been put to shame; But as all things､ in truth we told you So even our boasting before Titus turned out to be truth.
content_old: 14 That if in anything—unto him—in your behalf—I have boasted I have not been put to shame; But as all things､ in truth we told you So even our boasting before Titus turned out to be truth.

content: 15 And his tender affections are much more abundantly towards you､ When he calleth to mind the obedience of you all,— How with fear and trembling ye gave him welcome.
content_old: 15 And his tender affections are much more abundantly towards you､ When he calleth to mind the obedience of you all,— How with fear and trembling ye gave him welcome.

content: 1 Moreover we make known unto you､ brethren､ The favour of God which hath been given in the assemblies of Macedonia,—
content_old: 1 Moreover we make known unto you､ brethren､ The favour of God which hath been given in the assemblies of Macedonia,—

content: 2 That in a great testing of tribulation The superabounding of their joy and their deep destitution Superabounded unto the riches of their liberality;
content_old: 2 That in a great testing of tribulation The superabounding of their joy and their deep destitution Superabounded unto the riches of their liberality;

content: 3 That according to power､ I bear witness､ and beyond power Of their own accord they acted,—
content_old: 3 That according to power､ I bear witness､ and beyond power Of their own accord they acted,—

content: 4 With much exhortation entreating of us the favour and the fellowship of the ministry which was for the saints;—
content_old: 4 With much exhortation entreating of us the favour and the fellowship of the ministry which was for the saints;—

content: 5 And not merely as we hoped But themselves gave they､ first､ unto the Lord and unto us through God’s will,
content_old: 5 And not merely as we hoped But themselves gave they､ first､ unto the Lord and unto us through God’s will,

content: 6 To the end we should exhort Titus､ in order that According as he before made a beginning So he should also complete unto you this favour also.
content_old: 6 To the end we should exhort Titus､ in order that According as he before made a beginning So he should also complete unto you this favour also.

content: 7 But just as in everything ye superabound,— In faith､ and discourse､ and knowledge､ and all earnestness, and in the love among you which proceedeth from us In order that in this favour also ye would superabound.
content_old: 7 But just as in everything ye superabound,— In faith､ and discourse､ and knowledge､ and all earnestness, and in the love among you which proceedeth from us In order that in this favour also ye would superabound.

content: 8 Not by way of injunction do I speak, But through others’ earnestness､ And the genuineness of your own love putting to the test.
content_old: 8 Not by way of injunction do I speak, But through others’ earnestness､ And the genuineness of your own love putting to the test.

content: 9 For ye are taking knowledge of the favour of our Lord Jesus Christ,— How that for your sakes he became destitute—although he was rich, In order that ye by his destitution might be enriched.
content_old: 9 For ye are taking knowledge of the favour of our Lord Jesus Christ,— How that for your sakes he became destitute—although he was rich, In order that ye by his destitution might be enriched.

content: 10 And a judgment､ herein do I give,— For this､ unto you is profitable,— Who､ indeed not only of the doing､ but of the desiring made for yourselves a beginning a year ago;—
content_old: 10 And a judgment､ herein do I give,— For this､ unto you is profitable,— Who､ indeed not only of the doing､ but of the desiring made for yourselves a beginning a year ago;—

content: 11 Howbeit now the doing also complete ye, In order that even according to the forwardness of the desiring So may be the completing—out of what ye have.
content_old: 11 Howbeit now the doing also complete ye, In order that even according to the forwardness of the desiring So may be the completing—out of what ye have.

content: 12 For if the forwardness is set forth According to what one may have he is well approved, Not according to what one hath not.
content_old: 12 For if the forwardness is set forth According to what one may have he is well approved, Not according to what one hath not.

content: 13 For not that unto others should be relief､ and unto you distress do I speak, But by equality In the present season your surplus for their deficiency,—
content_old: 13 For not that unto others should be relief､ and unto you distress do I speak, But by equality In the present season your surplus for their deficiency,—

content: 14 In order that their surplus may come to be for your deficiency: That there may come about an equality:—
content_old: 14 In order that their surplus may come to be for your deficiency: That there may come about an equality:—

content: 15 Even as it is written— He that gathered the much had not more than enough, And he that gathered the little had not less.
content_old: 15 Even as it is written— He that gathered the much had not more than enough, And he that gathered the little had not less.

content: 16 Thanks､ however､ unto God!— Who is putting the same earnestness in your behalf in the heart of Titus,
content_old: 16 Thanks､ however､ unto God!— Who is putting the same earnestness in your behalf in the heart of Titus,

content: 17 In that though､ indeed､ the exhortation he welcomed Yet already being greatly in earnest, of his own accord hath he gone forth unto you.
content_old: 17 In that though､ indeed､ the exhortation he welcomed Yet already being greatly in earnest, of his own accord hath he gone forth unto you.

content: 18 Howbeit､ we have set forward､ with him､ the brother whose praise in the Glad Tidings hath gone through all the assemblies:—
content_old: 18 Howbeit､ we have set forward､ with him､ the brother whose praise in the Glad Tidings hath gone through all the assemblies:—

content: 19 Not only so､ however but he hath also been appointed by the assemblies､ as a fellow-traveller with us in this favour､ which is being ministered by us with a view to the Lord’s glory and our earnest desire:—
content_old: 19 Not only so､ however but he hath also been appointed by the assemblies､ as a fellow-traveller with us in this favour､ which is being ministered by us with a view to the Lord’s glory and our earnest desire:—

content: 20 Arranging this—lest anyone upon us should cast blame､ in this munificence which is being ministered by us;
content_old: 20 Arranging this—lest anyone upon us should cast blame､ in this munificence which is being ministered by us;

content: 21 For we provide things honourable, not only before the Lord､ but also before men.
content_old: 21 For we provide things honourable, not only before the Lord､ but also before men.

content: 22 Moreover we have set forward､ with them､ our brother whom we have proved in many things､ ofttimes earnest,— But now much more earnest､ by reason of the great confidence which he hath towards you.
content_old: 22 Moreover we have set forward､ with them､ our brother whom we have proved in many things､ ofttimes earnest,— But now much more earnest､ by reason of the great confidence which he hath towards you.

content: 23 Whether as regardeth Titus He is a partner of mine, and towards you a fellow-worker. Or our brethren Apostles of assemblies､ and Christ’s glory.
content_old: 23 Whether as regardeth Titus He is a partner of mine, and towards you a fellow-worker. Or our brethren Apostles of assemblies､ and Christ’s glory.

content: 1 For､ indeed､ concerning the ministry which is for the saints It is superfluous for me to be writing to you;
content_old: 1 For､ indeed､ concerning the ministry which is for the saints It is superfluous for me to be writing to you;

content: 2 For I know your forwardness of mind— Of which in your behalf I am boasting unto Macedonians､ That Achaia hath been prepared for a year past,— And your zeal hath stirred up the greater number of them.
content_old: 2 For I know your forwardness of mind— Of which in your behalf I am boasting unto Macedonians､ That Achaia hath been prepared for a year past,— And your zeal hath stirred up the greater number of them.

content: 3 Nevertheless I have sent the brethren､ That our boast in your behalf be not made void in this respect, That even as I was saying ye may be prepared,—
content_old: 3 Nevertheless I have sent the brethren､ That our boast in your behalf be not made void in this respect, That even as I was saying ye may be prepared,—

content: 4 Lest by any means if there should come with me Macedonians､ and find you unprepared We—not to say ye—should be put to shame in this confidence.
content_old: 4 Lest by any means if there should come with me Macedonians､ and find you unprepared We—not to say ye—should be put to shame in this confidence.

content: 5 Necessary therefore､ I regarded it､ To exhort the brethren that they would go forward unto you, And make up beforehand your previously-promised blessing. The same to be ready—thus､ as a blessing and not as of constraint.
content_old: 5 Necessary therefore､ I regarded it､ To exhort the brethren that they would go forward unto you, And make up beforehand your previously-promised blessing. The same to be ready—thus､ as a blessing and not as of constraint.

content: 6 As to this､ however He that soweth sparingly Sparingly also shall reap, And he that soweth with blessings With blessings also shall reap:
content_old: 6 As to this､ however He that soweth sparingly Sparingly also shall reap, And he that soweth with blessings With blessings also shall reap:

content: 7 Each one､ according as he hath purposed in his heart Not sorrowfully､ nor of necessity,— For a cheerful giver God loveth.
content_old: 7 Each one､ according as he hath purposed in his heart Not sorrowfully､ nor of necessity,— For a cheerful giver God loveth.

content: 8 Moreover God is able to cause every gracious gift to superabound unto you, In order that having in every thing､ at every time､ every kind of sufficiency of your own Ye may be superabounding unto every good work;
content_old: 8 Moreover God is able to cause every gracious gift to superabound unto you, In order that having in every thing､ at every time､ every kind of sufficiency of your own Ye may be superabounding unto every good work;

content: 9 Even as it is written— He hath scattered abroad, He hath given to the needy,— His righteousness abideth to futurity.
content_old: 9 Even as it is written— He hath scattered abroad, He hath given to the needy,— His righteousness abideth to futurity.

content: 10 Now he that supplieth seed to the sower､ and bread for eating Will supply and multiply your seed for sowing, And cause to grow your fruits of righteousness:
content_old: 10 Now he that supplieth seed to the sower､ and bread for eating Will supply and multiply your seed for sowing, And cause to grow your fruits of righteousness:

content: 11 In every thing being enriched､ unto every kind of liberality,— Which､ indeed､ worketh out､ through us､ thanksgiving unto God;
content_old: 11 In every thing being enriched､ unto every kind of liberality,— Which､ indeed､ worketh out､ through us､ thanksgiving unto God;

content: 12 Because the ministry of this public service is not only towards filling up the deficiencies of the saints, but also superabounding through the thanksgiving of many unto God,—
content_old: 12 Because the ministry of this public service is not only towards filling up the deficiencies of the saints, but also superabounding through the thanksgiving of many unto God,—

content: 13 Of many who through the proof of this ministry are glorifying God for your acknowledged submission unto the glad-message of the Christ､ and for the liberality of the fellowship unto them､ and unto all,—
content_old: 13 Of many who through the proof of this ministry are glorifying God for your acknowledged submission unto the glad-message of the Christ､ and for the liberality of the fellowship unto them､ and unto all,—

content: 14 Themselves also with supplication on your behalf longing after you､ by reason of the surpassing favour of God resting upon you:—
content_old: 14 Themselves also with supplication on your behalf longing after you､ by reason of the surpassing favour of God resting upon you:—

content: 1 Moreover I､ Paul､ myself exhort you, Through the meekness and considerateness of the Christ,— I who to look upon､ indeed am lowly among you, But absent am bold towards you;—
content_old: 1 Moreover I､ Paul､ myself exhort you, Through the meekness and considerateness of the Christ,— I who to look upon､ indeed am lowly among you, But absent am bold towards you;—

content: 2 I entreat､ however､ That when present I may not be bold with the assurance wherewith I think to be daring against some who account of us as though according to flesh we were walking,—
content_old: 2 I entreat､ however､ That when present I may not be bold with the assurance wherewith I think to be daring against some who account of us as though according to flesh we were walking,—

content: 3 For though in flesh we walk Not according to flesh do we war,—
content_old: 3 For though in flesh we walk Not according to flesh do we war,—

content: 4 For the weapons of our warfare are not fleshly､ But mighty､ by God､ unto a pulling down of strongholds,—
content_old: 4 For the weapons of our warfare are not fleshly､ But mighty､ by God､ unto a pulling down of strongholds,—

content: 5 When we pull down calculations and every height that uplifteth itself against the knowledge of God, And when we bring into captivity every thought unto the obedience of the Christ,
content_old: 5 When we pull down calculations and every height that uplifteth itself against the knowledge of God, And when we bring into captivity every thought unto the obedience of the Christ,

content: 6 And when we hold ourselves in readiness to avenge all disobedience､ As soon as your obedience shall be fulfilled!
content_old: 6 And when we hold ourselves in readiness to avenge all disobedience､ As soon as your obedience shall be fulfilled!

content: 7 The things that lie on the surface ye are looking at:— If anyone hath come to trust in himself that he is Christ’s This let him reckon､ again､ with himself— That even as he is Christ’s So also are we.
content_old: 7 The things that lie on the surface ye are looking at:— If anyone hath come to trust in himself that he is Christ’s This let him reckon､ again､ with himself— That even as he is Christ’s So also are we.

content: 8 Yea if somewhat more abundantly I should boast concerning our authority— Which the Lord hath given for building up and not for pulling you down I shall not be put to shame,—
content_old: 8 Yea if somewhat more abundantly I should boast concerning our authority— Which the Lord hath given for building up and not for pulling you down I shall not be put to shame,—

content: 9 That I may not seem as though I would be terrifying you through means of my letters;
content_old: 9 That I may not seem as though I would be terrifying you through means of my letters;

content: 10 Because The letters､ it is true (saith one), are weighty and strong, But the presence of the body is weak､ and the discourse contemptible;—
content_old: 10 Because The letters､ it is true (saith one), are weighty and strong, But the presence of the body is weak､ and the discourse contemptible;—

content: 11 This let such a one reckon— That what we are､ in our word､ through means of letters､ being absent Such also being present are we in our deed.
content_old: 11 This let such a one reckon— That what we are､ in our word､ through means of letters､ being absent Such also being present are we in our deed.

content: 12 For we dare not class or compare ourselves with some who do themselves commend; But they among themselves measuring themselves､ and comparing themselves with themselves Are without discernment!
content_old: 12 For we dare not class or compare ourselves with some who do themselves commend; But they among themselves measuring themselves､ and comparing themselves with themselves Are without discernment!

content: 13 We however not as to the things without measure will boast ourselves, But､ according to the measure of the limit which God apportioned unto us as a measure— To reach as far as even you!
content_old: 13 We however not as to the things without measure will boast ourselves, But､ according to the measure of the limit which God apportioned unto us as a measure— To reach as far as even you!

content: 14 For not as though we were not reaching unto you are we over-stretching ourselves, For as far as even you were we beforehand in the glad-message of the Christ:
content_old: 14 For not as though we were not reaching unto you are we over-stretching ourselves, For as far as even you were we beforehand in the glad-message of the Christ:

content: 15 Not as to the things without measure boasting ourselves in other men’s toils, But having hope—your faith growing—among you to be enlarged according to our limit for something beyond,—
content_old: 15 Not as to the things without measure boasting ourselves in other men’s toils, But having hope—your faith growing—among you to be enlarged according to our limit for something beyond,—

content: 16 Unto the regions beyond you to carry the glad-message: Not within another man’s limit､ as to the things made ready to boast ourselves.
content_old: 16 Unto the regions beyond you to carry the glad-message: Not within another man’s limit､ as to the things made ready to boast ourselves.

content: 17 He that boasteth however､ in the Lord let him boast;
content_old: 17 He that boasteth however､ in the Lord let him boast;

content: 1 I could wish ye would bear with me as to some little foolishness,— Nay! do even bear with me!
content_old: 1 I could wish ye would bear with me as to some little foolishness,— Nay! do even bear with me!

content: 2 For I am jealous over you with a jealousy of God; For I myself betrothed you unto one husband､ To present a chaste virgin unto the Christ,—
content_old: 2 For I am jealous over you with a jealousy of God; For I myself betrothed you unto one husband､ To present a chaste virgin unto the Christ,—

content: 3 But I fear lest､ by any means､ As the serpent completely deceived Eve､ in his craftiness Your minds should be corrupted from the singleness and the chasteness which are due unto the Christ.
content_old: 3 But I fear lest､ by any means､ As the serpent completely deceived Eve､ in his craftiness Your minds should be corrupted from the singleness and the chasteness which are due unto the Christ.

content: 4 For if､ indeed､ he that cometh is proclaiming another Jesus､ Whom we have not proclaimed, Or a different Spirit ye are receiving､ Which ye had not received, Or a different glad-message､ Which ye have never welcomed Ye are well bearing.
content_old: 4 For if､ indeed､ he that cometh is proclaiming another Jesus､ Whom we have not proclaimed, Or a different Spirit ye are receiving､ Which ye had not received, Or a different glad-message､ Which ye have never welcomed Ye are well bearing.

content: 5 For I reckon not to have come a whit behind the exceeding overmuch apostles;
content_old: 5 For I reckon not to have come a whit behind the exceeding overmuch apostles;

content: 6 And even if uncultured in my discourse Certainly not in my knowledge,— But in every way having made it manifest､ in all things､ unto you.
content_old: 6 And even if uncultured in my discourse Certainly not in my knowledge,— But in every way having made it manifest､ in all things､ unto you.

content: 7 Or a sin did I commit— Abasing myself that ye might be exalted,— In that free of charge God’s glad-message I announced unto you?
content_old: 7 Or a sin did I commit— Abasing myself that ye might be exalted,— In that free of charge God’s glad-message I announced unto you?

content: 8 Other assemblies I despoiled､ receiving supplies that I might minister unto you;
content_old: 8 Other assemblies I despoiled､ receiving supplies that I might minister unto you;

content: 9 And being present with you､ and having come short I was not burdensome to anyone,— For my deficiency the brethren､ coming from Macedonia､ helped to make up;— And in everything､ without burden unto you I kept myself—and will keep!
content_old: 9 And being present with you､ and having come short I was not burdensome to anyone,— For my deficiency the brethren､ coming from Macedonia､ helped to make up;— And in everything､ without burden unto you I kept myself—and will keep!

content: 10 Truth of Christ is in me that this boasting shall not be silenced unto me､ in the regions of Achaia.
content_old: 10 Truth of Christ is in me that this boasting shall not be silenced unto me､ in the regions of Achaia.

content: 11 Wherefore? Because I love you not? God knoweth!
content_old: 11 Wherefore? Because I love you not? God knoweth!

content: 12 But what I am doing I also will do,— That I may cut off the occasion of them who are wishing an occasion, That wherein they are boasting themselves they may be found even as also we.
content_old: 12 But what I am doing I also will do,— That I may cut off the occasion of them who are wishing an occasion, That wherein they are boasting themselves they may be found even as also we.

content: 13 For such as these are false apostles, deceitful workers, transfiguring themselves into apostles of Christ.
content_old: 13 For such as these are false apostles, deceitful workers, transfiguring themselves into apostles of Christ.

content: 14 And no marvel! For Satan himself doth transfigure himself into a messenger of light!
content_old: 14 And no marvel! For Satan himself doth transfigure himself into a messenger of light!

content: 15 No great thing､ therefore if his ministers also are transfiguring themselves as ministers of righteousness!— Whose end shall be according to their works.
content_old: 15 No great thing､ therefore if his ministers also are transfiguring themselves as ministers of righteousness!— Whose end shall be according to their works.

content: 16 Again I say— Let no one deem me to be foolish; But otherwise､ at least as foolish give me welcome, That I also some little may boast myself.
content_old: 16 Again I say— Let no one deem me to be foolish; But otherwise､ at least as foolish give me welcome, That I also some little may boast myself.

content: 17 What I am saying Not according to the Lord am I saying, but as in foolishness,— In this my boastful confidence!
content_old: 17 What I am saying Not according to the Lord am I saying, but as in foolishness,— In this my boastful confidence!

content: 18 Since many are boasting after the flesh I also will boast;
content_old: 18 Since many are boasting after the flesh I also will boast;

content: 19 For gladly do ye bear with the foolish, Being yourselves discreet,—
content_old: 19 For gladly do ye bear with the foolish, Being yourselves discreet,—

content: 20 For ye bear with it— If anyone enslaveth you､ if any devoureth､ if anyone taketh､ if anyone lifteth himself up､ if anyone on the face doth smite you!
content_old: 20 For ye bear with it— If anyone enslaveth you､ if any devoureth､ if anyone taketh､ if anyone lifteth himself up､ if anyone on the face doth smite you!

content: 21 By way of disparagement am I speaking,—As though we had been weak! Whereas in whatsoever anyone dareth in foolishness I speak I also dare:—
content_old: 21 By way of disparagement am I speaking,—As though we had been weak! Whereas in whatsoever anyone dareth in foolishness I speak I also dare:—

content: 22 Hebrews are they? I also, Israelites are they? I also, Seed of Abraham are they? I also,
content_old: 22 Hebrews are they? I also, Israelites are they? I also, Seed of Abraham are they? I also,

content: 23 Ministers of Christ are they? As one deranged I am talking I above measure!— In toils superabundantly, In prisons superabundantly, In stripes to excess, In deaths oft,—
content_old: 23 Ministers of Christ are they? As one deranged I am talking I above measure!— In toils superabundantly, In prisons superabundantly, In stripes to excess, In deaths oft,—

content: 24 From Jews five times forty-save-one have I received,
content_old: 24 From Jews five times forty-save-one have I received,

content: 25 Thrice have I been beaten with rods, Once have I been stoned, Thrice have I been shipwrecked, A day and night in the deep have I spent;
content_old: 25 Thrice have I been beaten with rods, Once have I been stoned, Thrice have I been shipwrecked, A day and night in the deep have I spent;

content: 26 In journeyings oft, In perils of rivers､ in perils of robbers､ in perils from my own race､ in perils from Gentiles､ in perils in the city､ in perils in the desert､ in perils by the sea､ in perils among false brethren,
content_old: 26 In journeyings oft, In perils of rivers､ in perils of robbers､ in perils from my own race､ in perils from Gentiles､ in perils in the city､ in perils in the desert､ in perils by the sea､ in perils among false brethren,

content: 27 in toil and hardship､ in watchings oft, in hunger and thirst､ in fasting oft, in cold and nakedness:—
content_old: 27 in toil and hardship､ in watchings oft, in hunger and thirst､ in fasting oft, in cold and nakedness:—

content: 28 Apart from the things without My daily care—my anxiety for all the assemblies;—
content_old: 28 Apart from the things without My daily care—my anxiety for all the assemblies;—

content: 29 Who is weak､ and I am not weak? Who is caused to stumble､ and I am not burning?
content_old: 29 Who is weak､ and I am not weak? Who is caused to stumble､ and I am not burning?

content: 30 If to boast is needful in the things that concern my weakness will I boast.
content_old: 30 If to boast is needful in the things that concern my weakness will I boast.

content: 31 The God and Father of our Lord Jesus knoweth— He who is blessed unto the ages— That I am not speaking falsely:
content_old: 31 The God and Father of our Lord Jesus knoweth— He who is blessed unto the ages— That I am not speaking falsely:

content: 32 In Damascus the governor under Aretas the king was guarding the city of Damascenes､ to apprehend me,—
content_old: 32 In Damascus the governor under Aretas the king was guarding the city of Damascenes､ to apprehend me,—

content: 1 To be boasting is needful,—it is not､ indeed､ profitable, Yet will I come to visions and revelations of the Lord:—
content_old: 1 To be boasting is needful,—it is not､ indeed､ profitable, Yet will I come to visions and revelations of the Lord:—

content: 2 I know a man in Christ､ Who fourteen years ago Whether in the body､ I know not, Or out of the body､ I know not, God knoweth Such a one as this caught away as far as the third heaven;
content_old: 2 I know a man in Christ､ Who fourteen years ago Whether in the body､ I know not, Or out of the body､ I know not, God knoweth Such a one as this caught away as far as the third heaven;

content: 3 And I know such a man as this､ Whether in the body or apart from the body､ I know not,—God knoweth
content_old: 3 And I know such a man as this､ Whether in the body or apart from the body､ I know not,—God knoweth

content: 4 How that he was caught away into paradise, And heard unspeakable things､ Which it is not allowable for a man to utter:
content_old: 4 How that he was caught away into paradise, And heard unspeakable things､ Which it is not allowable for a man to utter:

content: 5 On behalf of such a one as this will I boast, But on behalf of myself will I not boast save in my weaknesses;—
content_old: 5 On behalf of such a one as this will I boast, But on behalf of myself will I not boast save in my weaknesses;—

content: 6 Although in fact if I should wish to boast I shall not be foolish, for the truth would I speak; But I forbear､ lest anyone unto me should reckon above what he beholdeth me to be､ or heareth from me,— Even by the exceeding greatness of the revelations.
content_old: 6 Although in fact if I should wish to boast I shall not be foolish, for the truth would I speak; But I forbear､ lest anyone unto me should reckon above what he beholdeth me to be､ or heareth from me,— Even by the exceeding greatness of the revelations.

content: 7 Wherefore lest I should be unduly lifted up There was given to me a thorn in the flesh, A messenger of Satan､ that he might buffet me,— Lest I should be unduly lifted up.
content_old: 7 Wherefore lest I should be unduly lifted up There was given to me a thorn in the flesh, A messenger of Satan､ that he might buffet me,— Lest I should be unduly lifted up.

content: 8 In this behalf thrice besought I the Lord､ that it might depart from me;
content_old: 8 In this behalf thrice besought I the Lord､ that it might depart from me;

content: 9 And at once he said unto me— Sufficient for thee is my favour, For my power in weakness is made complete. Most gladly therefore､ will I rather boast in my weaknesses, That the power of Christ may spread a tent over me.
content_old: 9 And at once he said unto me— Sufficient for thee is my favour, For my power in weakness is made complete. Most gladly therefore､ will I rather boast in my weaknesses, That the power of Christ may spread a tent over me.

content: 10 Wherefore､ I take pleasure in weaknesses､ in insults､ in necessities､ in persecutions and straits, In behalf of Christ; For as soon as I am weak then am I powerful.
content_old: 10 Wherefore､ I take pleasure in weaknesses､ in insults､ in necessities､ in persecutions and straits, In behalf of Christ; For as soon as I am weak then am I powerful.

content: 11 I have become foolish,—ye compelled me:— I､ in fact､ ought by you to have been commended; For not a whit have I come behind the exceeding overmuch apostles,— Even if I am nothing:
content_old: 11 I have become foolish,—ye compelled me:— I､ in fact､ ought by you to have been commended; For not a whit have I come behind the exceeding overmuch apostles,— Even if I am nothing:

content: 12 The signs､ indeed､ of an apostle were wrought out among you in all endurance,— Both in signs､ and wonders､ and mighty works:
content_old: 12 The signs､ indeed､ of an apostle were wrought out among you in all endurance,— Both in signs､ and wonders､ and mighty works:

content: 13 For what is there wherein ye were made inferior to the rest of the assemblies,— Save that I myself would not allow myself to be a burden unto you? Forgive me this wrong!
content_old: 13 For what is there wherein ye were made inferior to the rest of the assemblies,— Save that I myself would not allow myself to be a burden unto you? Forgive me this wrong!

content: 14 Lo! this third time I am holding myself in readiness to come unto you, And I will not allow myself to be a burden; For I seek not yours､ but you;— For the children ought not to lay up for the parents, But the parents for the children;—
content_old: 14 Lo! this third time I am holding myself in readiness to come unto you, And I will not allow myself to be a burden; For I seek not yours､ but you;— For the children ought not to lay up for the parents, But the parents for the children;—

content: 15 And I most gladly will spend､ and be fully spent､ for your souls:— If I exceedingly love you am I the less loved?
content_old: 15 And I most gladly will spend､ and be fully spent､ for your souls:— If I exceedingly love you am I the less loved?

content: 16 But let it be!— I myself did not burden you,— Notwithstanding, being crafty with guile I caught you?
content_old: 16 But let it be!— I myself did not burden you,— Notwithstanding, being crafty with guile I caught you?

content: 17 Was there anyone of those whom I have sent unto you through whom I have overreached you?
content_old: 17 Was there anyone of those whom I have sent unto you through whom I have overreached you?

content: 18 I exhorted Titus､ and sent with him the brother,— Did Titus overreach you? Was it not in the same spirit we walked? Was it not in the same steps?
content_old: 18 I exhorted Titus､ and sent with him the brother,— Did Titus overreach you? Was it not in the same spirit we walked? Was it not in the same steps?

content: 19 All this time think ye､ that unto you we are making a defence? Before God in Christ we speak;— But all these things､ beloved､ for your upbuilding.
content_old: 19 All this time think ye､ that unto you we are making a defence? Before God in Christ we speak;— But all these things､ beloved､ for your upbuilding.

content: 20 For I fear— Lest､ by any means､ when I come Not such as I wish should I find you, And I should be found by you､ such as ye do not wish;— Lest､ by any means､ I should find strife､ jealousy､ outbursts of wrath､ factions､ railings､ whisperings､ puffed up pretensions､ confusions;—
content_old: 20 For I fear— Lest､ by any means､ when I come Not such as I wish should I find you, And I should be found by you､ such as ye do not wish;— Lest､ by any means､ I should find strife､ jealousy､ outbursts of wrath､ factions､ railings､ whisperings､ puffed up pretensions､ confusions;—

content: 1 This third time am I coming unto you:— At the mouth of two witnesses or three shall every matter be established.
content_old: 1 This third time am I coming unto you:— At the mouth of two witnesses or three shall every matter be established.

content: 2 I have said beforehand､ and do say beforehand,— As present the second time､ although now absent Unto them who before sinned､ and unto all the rest,— That if I come again I will not spare.
content_old: 2 I have said beforehand､ and do say beforehand,— As present the second time､ although now absent Unto them who before sinned､ and unto all the rest,— That if I come again I will not spare.

content: 3 Since a test ye are seeking､ of the speaking in me of Christ;— Who unto you is not weak､ But is powerful in you,—
content_old: 3 Since a test ye are seeking､ of the speaking in me of Christ;— Who unto you is not weak､ But is powerful in you,—

content: 4 For although he was crucified through weakness､ Yet is he living through God’s power,— For although we are weak in him､ Yet shall we live with him､ through God’s power unto us—
content_old: 4 For although he was crucified through weakness､ Yet is he living through God’s power,— For although we are weak in him､ Yet shall we live with him､ through God’s power unto us—

content: 5 Be trying yourselves whether ye are in the faith, Be putting yourselves to the test! Or do ye not recognise yourselves､ Seeing that Jesus Christ is in you,— Unless perhaps ye fail in the testing.
content_old: 5 Be trying yourselves whether ye are in the faith, Be putting yourselves to the test! Or do ye not recognise yourselves､ Seeing that Jesus Christ is in you,— Unless perhaps ye fail in the testing.

content: 6 I hope､ however､ that ye shall come to know､ that we fail not in the testing!
content_old: 6 I hope､ however､ that ye shall come to know､ that we fail not in the testing!

content: 7 But we pray unto God､ that ye may do nothing base,— Not that we may appear accepted, But that ye the honourable thing may be doing､ even though we should be､ as it were､ rejected;
content_old: 7 But we pray unto God､ that ye may do nothing base,— Not that we may appear accepted, But that ye the honourable thing may be doing､ even though we should be､ as it were､ rejected;

content: 8 For we can do nothing against the truth, but for the truth;
content_old: 8 For we can do nothing against the truth, but for the truth;

content: 9 For we rejoice—whensoever we are weak､ and ye are strong. This also we pray for—your restoration:—
content_old: 9 For we rejoice—whensoever we are weak､ and ye are strong. This also we pray for—your restoration:—

content: 10 For this cause these things､ while absent am I writing, That I may not when present deal sharply— According to the authority which the Lord hath given me､ for building up and not for pulling down.
content_old: 10 For this cause these things､ while absent am I writing, That I may not when present deal sharply— According to the authority which the Lord hath given me､ for building up and not for pulling down.

content: 11 Finally brethren､ farewell! Be getting restored, be taking encouragement, be of one mind, live in peace,— And the God of love and peace will be with you.
content_old: 11 Finally brethren､ farewell! Be getting restored, be taking encouragement, be of one mind, live in peace,— And the God of love and peace will be with you.

content: 12 Salute ye one another with a holy kiss. All the saints salute you.
content_old: 12 Salute ye one another with a holy kiss. All the saints salute you.
